```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
noaa_df = read_csv(file = "/Users/cameronchesbrough/camchesbro/website_pages/nynoaadat.csv")


noaa_df = noaa_df %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  drop_na() %>%
  mutate(date = as.character(date)) %>%
  filter(date >= 2000) %>%
  filter(day(date)==24) %>%
  filter(month(date)==12)

noaa_df %>%
  plot_ly(x = ~snwd, y = ~snow, type = "scatter", mode = "markers",
    text = ~date, alpha = 0.5)

noaa_df %>%
  filter(snow > 0) %>%
  count(date) %>%
  plot_ly(x = ~date, y = ~n, type = "bar", mode = "markers",
    alpha = 0.5)

noaa_df %>%
  plot_ly(x = ~date, y = ~snow, type = "box",
    alpha = 0.5)



```
